verses.verse: <S%H2734>Fret<s%> not yourself because of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%>, neither be you <S%H7065>envious<s%> against the <S%H6213>workers<s%> of <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>.
For they shall <S%H4120>soon<s%> be cut <S%H5243>down<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass<s%>, and <S%H5034>wither<s%> as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb<s%>.
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; so shall you <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H530>truly<s%> you shall be <S%H7462>fed<s%>.
<S%H6026>Delight<s%> yourself also in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H982>trust<s%> also in <S%H6213>him<s%>; and he shall bring it to pass.
And he shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H216>light<s%>, and your <S%H4941>judgment<s%> as the <S%H6672>noonday<s%>.

<S%H1826>Rest<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and wait <S%H2342>patiently<s%> for <S%H2734>him<s%>: fret not yourself because of him who <S%H6743>prospers<s%> in his <S%H1870>way<s%>, because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>brings<s%> wicked <S%H4209>devices<s%> to <S%H6213>pass<s%>.
<S%H7503>Cease<s%> from <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%>: <S%H2734>fret<s%> not yourself in any <S%H389>wise<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>.
For <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>: but those that <S%H6960>wait<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
For yet a little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H995>be<s%>: Yes, you shall diligently consider his <S%H4725>place<s%>, and it shall not be.
But the <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and shall <S%H6026>delight<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plots<s%> against the <S%H6662>just<s%>, and <S%H2786>gnashes<s%> upon him with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H7200>him<s%>: for he sees that his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%>.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have drawn <S%H6605>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and have <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow<s%>, to cast <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, and to <S%H2873>kill<s%> such as are <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H1870>behavior<s%>.
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
A <S%H4592>little<s%> that a righteous <S%H6662>man<s%> has is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1995>riches<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
For the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>: but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>upright<s%>: and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
They shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> in the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>: and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>.

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, and the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be as the <S%H3368>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%>: they shall <S%H3615>consume<s%>; into <S%H6227>smoke<s%> shall they consume <S%H3615>away<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3867>borrows<s%>, and pays not <S%H7999>again<s%>: but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shows <S%H2603>mercy<s%>, and <S%H5414>gives<s%>.
For such as are <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of him shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and they that are <S%H7043>cursed<s%> of him shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
The <S%H4703>steps<s%> of a good <S%H1397>man<s%> are <S%H3559>ordered<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Though he <S%H5307>fall<s%>, he shall not be utterly cast <S%H2904>down<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

I have been <S%H5288>young<s%>, and now am <S%H2204>old<s%>; yet have I not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, nor his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
He is <S%H3117>ever<s%> <S%H2603>merciful<s%>, and <S%H3867>lends<s%>; and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed<s%>.
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; and <S%H7931>live<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> not his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; they are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: but the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7931>live<s%> in it for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>speaks<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1696>talks<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>; none of his <S%H838>steps<s%> shall <S%H4571>slide<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>watches<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and <S%H1245>seeks<s%> to kill <S%H4191>him<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, nor <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him when he is <S%H8199>judged<s%>.

<S%H6960>Wait<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, you shall see <S%H7200>it<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in great <S%H6184>power<s%>, and <S%H6168>spreading<s%> himself like a <S%H7488>green<s%> bay <S%H249>tree<s%>.
Yet he passed <S%H5674>away<s%>, <S%H1245>and<s%>, behold, he was not: Yes, I sought <S%H4672>him<s%>, but he could not be found.
<S%H8104>Mark<s%> the <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H7200>man<s%>, and behold the <S%H3477>upright<s%>: for the <S%H319>end<s%> of that <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
But the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: he is their <S%H4581>strength<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H6403>them<s%>, and deliver <S%H6403>them<s%>: he shall deliver them from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H2620>them<s%>, because they trust in him.
